alert.note: Alert for Harding County; Quay County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 21 at 3:13PM MDT until March 22 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT TUESDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 7 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, north winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. For the High Wind Warning, north winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...Quay County and Harding County. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, from 7 AM to 7 PM MDT Tuesday. For the High Wind Warning, until 6 AM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing snow from recently snowfall accumulation will be possible, causing reduced visibility.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.
